name: LEO Express
goal:
LEO Express is a European private railway company that is on a mission to make train travel your first option for transportation. Integrating modern electric trains with energy - efficient buses and the lastest technology, LEO Express competes with state railway systems and set new high - quality customer service standards.
LEO Express trains are low-deck, fully conditioned aerodynamical units produced by swiss company Stadler equipped with unique modern technologies and interior which is adapted for long distance travels.
euInitiatives:
- EU railway transportation
- the Fourth railway package
- Regulation 1370/2007
- Directive 2012/34/EU
